channel.title: Help with error
channel.description: I need help with java.lang.OutofSpace Jave heap space error, It happens once in a while and after that no one else can log into my server until auto restart. If Somebody could help me or link me somewhere that would be muc appreciated.

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Nearly right phonecheck.

In your run.bat, go to the line that has something like:

java server

replace that with:

java -Xmx500m server

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

Open up your compiler and add this before the line that compiles the Java.

-Xmx500m

If you don’t know where that line is i can’t help you because my compilers way different then yours.

Read full topic
